extendedInfo.description: Goals list is a handy application intended to motivate you in reaching your goals.You have a dream or just a plan? It costs some money? Let Goals List keep it!* Create and view your goals* Put a widget to your home screen and access your goals more easily [new]* Assign pictures to your goals to make them feel more real* Download pictures from the internet or take your own photos* Track your progress in reaching the goal as a stylish battery view* Choose recently used currencies from the top of the currency listSupport the project. Click on banners!

reviews.title: I like it!
reviews.comment: It helps me see where I am on saving for the things I want, and is a good motivator.  The only thing I\'d like to see added is the ability to put the goals in the order I choose ... alphabetical, most important, etc.  With that change, I\'d give it 5 stars!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would love to be able to prioritize my goals and be able to select the currency once instead of having to select it every time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t put pics
reviews.comment: Good app but major bug: it doesn\'t load the picture that u want to assign to your goal.. Fix this!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: This app is awesome. Keeping track of my financial goals is so easy now. I really like this app a lot and I would recommended it to my friends.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I really do like this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force close when trying to upload pic.
reviews.comment: Love the idea but be cool if.. Instead of entering balance, it calculated balance when enter $ down towards goal. Edgar\'s idea-how long before reached

reviews.comment: Simple and works as expected. Love its home screen widget. HTC Desire

reviews.comment: Only good for financial goals. Wouldn\'t let me add a picture. HTC desire.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I searched everywhere for a simple app that would do exactly this! I love it! Doesn\'t seem to work with Asus Transformer Infinity Tablet but does with my HTC Inspire! Love it!
